node.content: What should be the gift for mother that should care her like the products she used to buy for us at our childhood? True that only mother nature could do better parenting for our mothers, that’s why "Mama Earth" hair nourishment kit could be a gift which is just a natural extract and no chemicals. We all knew with growing age our hair loses the strength and more we use the chemical based products for our hair, they fall more. Gift a complete hair solution package to mother which consist cleaning shampoo, conditioner and nourishment oil, an onion extract which untangled and provide strength to resist the hair fall. Many satisfied customers comment with positive feedback and shows trust for subscribe at purchase. One of the best things to gift which remain in use and not so much cheap so that avoided.
node.alt: Mamaearth Anti Hair Fall Spa Range with Onion Hair Oil  Onion Shampoo  Onion Conditioner for Hair Fall Control

node.name: 1.7 Litre Water Kettle MAKE: V-GUARD
node.description: Gifting a electric kettle can reduce this kitchen budget and fix it around 3-5%, also it will also effective to cut the natural resource consumption by home, even tag has eco-friendly living.
node.content: From automobile to induction everything converting itself into electric just to match the quality standards which comfort the mother nature. Lukewarm water extinguishes the thirst faster but to get water lukewarm we have to spend a fraction of natural gas and summation of these fraction of natural gases till month end cost kitchen budget 5 to 10%. Also, to heat milk we did the same and in totality overall budget for heating just a plain liquids accounts 10-15% of kitchen budget. Gifting a electric kettle can reduce this kitchen budget and fix it around 3-5%, also it will also effective to cut the natural resource consumption by home, even tag has eco-friendly living. Saving money just from changing work style is more acceptable by old people like mother and father moreover that money can be utilized in buying other healthy eatables which parents skip due to fixed kitchen budgets. Like natural gas stove, this 1.7 litre electric kettle is also easy to use and maintain and unlike the gas stove it doesn't require too much assembly space. Can also work with inverter so don't worry to gift this kitchen product to mother.
node.alt: VGuard VKS17 Prime 17L 1900 W Stainless Steel Electric Kettle with Cool Touch Body Copper Black

node.name: Ultra Leg Massager MAKE: JSB STORE
node.description: This foot massager is the practical solution which can help many job working couples or children’s who are so busy in their life that they don't have a single minute for their older.
node.content: We often get complained from our old parents or grandparents that due to household work or disease like arthritis their legs always remain in stressful pain. They have to take the massage therapy session or at night somebody have to press their legs. This foot massager is the practical solution which can help many job working couples or children’s who are so busy in their life that they don't have a single minute for their older. Frankly it is bad to avoid the request of parents for pressing their legs but it is too bad if you can't find the solution after so much learning and earning. This fully automatic massage servant helps in blood circulation while pressing the leg muscles like a real hand, also effective in calf pain, arthritis and knee pain. It could be a much likable gift for parents than any luxurious item just because it will be helpful for them and can be used every day.
node.alt: JSB HF05 Ultra Leg Massager for Pain Relief in Foot & Calf with Human Hands Like Pressing Heat Vibration & Reflexology Rollers WhiteBlue
